links.to_node: Ann may feel disappointed or hurt by my refusal to help her again, especially if she was genuinely seeking assistance with studying for the MCAT.
There may be a strain or awkwardness in our future interactions, especially if Ann feels rejected or misunderstood.

My reputation among mutual acquaintances or colleagues may be affected if Ann shares her perspective on our interactions, potentially leading to misunderstandings or negative assumptions about my intentions.
I may miss out on the opportunity to genuinely help someone in need, as well as the potential for a meaningful friendship or professional connection with Ann.
Ann may feel more pressure or stress about her visa situation and future plans if she doesn't have the support she was seeking from me.
